oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effects of organic fertilizers on yield and quality of potato tubers in organic farming
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kolbe, Hartmut
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
Education, extension and communication
Root crops
Composting and manuring
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this lecture, an overview was given over effects of organic fertilizers (compost, farmyard manure, slurry, organic commercial fertilizers) on yield and quality (DM, starch, contents of N, P, K) of potato tubers in organic farming.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kolbe, Hartmut (2006) Effects of organic fertilizers on yield and quality of potato tubers in organic farming. Speech at: Academy of Technology and Agriculture, Bydgoszcz, Polen, 25.10.2006.
